About.title: About me
About.bioP1: I'm a Software Engineer from Barcelona specialized in web and mobile development.
About.bioP2: I enjoy all kind of coding challenges and when not working I'm always geeking out on something!

1.title: Software Engineer
description: I developed web components, dialogs and widgets using Java and AEM framework (Adobe).
On the Front End side I used HTML5, SASS, Javascript, Backbone and jQuery.
International and Agile environment.

2.title: C++ Software Engineer
description: I developed digital gambling games using C++ and a game engine called Irrlicht.
I worked on some physics components for the games (collisions and movement).
Scrum environment.

3.title: Java Software Engineer
description: I developed Java services and worked on a base CMS framework that other teams would use to create websites.
I took care of the code reviews of the external team and the management of the releases for our framework.
I wrote technical specifications and documentation for the services I developed.
I developed all the Jenkins CI/CD infrastructure for the team and to automatize the releases.
I did presentations, workshops and training about Jenkins for the rest of the team.
Agile environment with Kanban methodology.

4.title: Software Engineer
description: I developed REST applications with Spring to retrieve data from the DBs.
On the FE side I used React to display the information on the company's website.
I used Redis on the BE to cache and speed up the retrieval of data.
I took care of upgrading the old polling system to display real time prices of the stock market, using WebSockets to stream the data.
I created a fake prices simulator using docker to aid on the debugging and testing of the data streaming.
I did load testing of the new system using Gatling.
Agile and Kanban methodology.

5.title: Software Engineer
description: I developed mobile applications using Dart and Flutter.
I took some trainings on iOS (Swift) and Android (Kotlin).
I developed my own portfolio website using NextJS and React.
Bachelor's degree in Aerospace Engineering (not finished)
Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
intro: Alvaro Mateo (referenced as the "author") operates noart.dev blog (referenced as the "website").
The author takes your privacy seriously. To better protect your privacy,
the author provides this privacy policy notice explaining the way your personal information

collection.title: Collection of Routine Information
p1: This website tracks basic information about its visitors.
This information includes, but is not limited to, browser details,
timestamps and referring pages. None of this information can personally
identify specific visitors to this website. The information is tracked
for routine administration and maintenance purposes.

cookies.title: Cookies
p1: Where necessary, this website uses cookies to store information about a visitor's
preferences and history to better serve the visitor and/or present the visitor with customized content.

advertisement.title: Advertisement and Other Third Parties
p1: Advertising partners and other third parties may use cookies, scripts and/or web beacons
to track visitor activities on this website to display advertisements and other useful information.
Such tracking is done directly by the third parties through their servers and is subject to their
privacy policies. This website has no access or control over these cookies, scripts and/or web
beacons that may be used by third parties.
p2: The author has included links on this website for your use and reference.
The author is not responsible for the privacy policies on these websites.
You should be aware that the privacy policies of these websites may differ from this website.

security.title: Security
p1: The security of your personal information is important to the author,
but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic
storage, is 100% secure. While the author strives to use commercially acceptable means
to protect your personal information, the author cannot guarantee its absolute security.

modifications.title: Privacy Policy Modifications
p1: This Privacy Policy is effective as of 2024-10-04 (yyyy-mm-dd) and will remain in effect.
Concerning changes in its provisions in the future, they will be in effect immediately after
being posted on this page. The author reserves the right to update or change this Privacy Policy
at any time and you should check this Privacy Policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Information
p1: For any questions or concerns regarding the privacy policy, please send the author
an email at [alvaromateo9@gmail.com](mailto:alvaromateo9@gmail.com).
